So far, four scientific publications came out of the SAVVY project.


- @stegherr_20_sap: Statistical analysis plan of the project, outlining all estimators and meta-analyses. [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/1912.00263) | [publication](https://doi.org/10.1002/bimj.201900347)
- @stegherr2020estimating: Comparison of estimators via simulations. [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2001.05709) | [publication](https://doi.org/10.1002/pst.2130)
- @stegherr_20_1sample: Estimation of AE risk in one group. [arxiv]() | [publication]()
- @rufibach_20_2sample: Estimating and comparing adverse event probabilities in the presence of varying follow-up times and competing events. [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2008.07881) | [publication](https://doi.org/10.1080/19466315.2022.2144944)
